title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - RFC
description: Prepare a comprehensive document detailing the scope, requirements, security considerations, performance expectations, scalability needs, integration points with existing military systems, compliance requirements, and relevant standards for the MilitaryIoTNetwork project. Identify key stakeholders and subject matter experts for input. This RFC is open to feedback from all team members, especially task-decomposer, project-manager, code-architect, frontend-developer, backend-developer, database-specialist, devops-engineer, qa-tester, security-specialist, and technical-writer. Upon finalization, the RFC will be reviewed by the project manager before moving to the next phase.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including network topology, communication protocols, and hardware/software components.

title: Develop Security Protocols and Mechanisms
description: Implement robust security protocols and mechanisms to ensure data confidentiality, integrity, and availability in the MilitaryIoTNetwork.

title: Design and Implement Network Infrastructure
description: Design and implement the network infrastructure, including routers, switches, and communication links, to support the MilitaryIoTNetwork.

title: Develop IoT Device Integration
description: Develop software components to integrate various IoT devices and sensors into the MilitaryIoTNetwork, including device discovery, registration, and data collection.

title: Design and Implement Data Management System
description: Design and implement a data management system to store, process, and analyze data collected from IoT devices in the MilitaryIoTNetwork.

title: Develop User Interfaces and Visualization Tools
description: Develop user interfaces and data visualization tools to present real-time and historical data from the MilitaryIoTNetwork in a meaningful and actionable way.
dependencies: Design and Implement Data Management System

title: Implement Continuous Integration and Deployment (CI/CD)
description: Set up a CI/CD pipeline to automate the build, testing, and deployment processes for the MilitaryIoTNetwork components.

title: Develop Test Plans and Conduct Testing
description: Create comprehensive test plans and execute various testing activities, including unit testing, integration testing, performance testing, and security testing.
dependencies: Design and Implement Data Management System
Develop User Interfaces and Visualization Tools

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation, including system architecture diagrams, API documentation, and user guides, to support the deployment and maintenance of the MilitaryIoTNetwork.
